tidbits.title: Stunning Landscapes
tidbits.description: Namibia is known for its stunning landscapes, including the Namib Desert, Etosha National Park, and the Fish River Canyon.

tidbits.title: Rich Wildlife
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse wildlife, with opportunities for safari experiences and conservation efforts, including for desert-adapted species.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Namibia's diverse cultures, including the Himba and San people, contribute to its rich cultural tapestry and unique traditions.
